text:
Sombat Metanee (; born 26 June 1937) is a Thai actor, singer, politician and movie director. He held the Guinness World Record for most movie appearances (more than 600). In 1966, he won the Golden Doll Award for his role in "Suek Bang Rajan".
He was among an all-star Thai cast in Chatrichalerm Yukol's "The Legend of Suriyothai". He had a small comedic role in the 2004 comedy, "Bangkok Loco" and played a senior police officer in the 2005 horror-comedy, '.
In 2006, he was elected to the National Assembly of Thailand.
